entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.1°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 29. POP 60%
